subject: Colleges and Universities
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Iowa Board of Regents has reopened its investigation into how the University of Iowa handled an investigation into a reported assault of a woman last October by two football players. The board met Tuesday to discuss letters that were sent to the university by the mother of the woman. The letters were not disclosed to the board until last week. David Miles, the board president, said, “This board owes Iowans a full accounting, and they will get it.”.
